title: Chacobo (2010) New Testament
description: Chacobo translation of the New Testament published in 2010 by Bible League International with Wycliffe Bible Translators. Chácobo-Pakawara is a Panoan language spoken by about 550 of 860 ethnic tribal Chácobo people of the Beni Department of northwest of Magdalena, Bolivia.

language.name: Chácobo
language.area: Northwest Beni, south of Riberaltaon, Alto Ivon River.
